title: ICAR IVRI Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in interview for Junior Research Fellow Posts
description: The Indian Veterinary Research Institute (ICAR IVRI) has officially released the notification for 01 Junior Research Fellow Posts. Interseted and eligible candidates can use this chance to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree and Post-graduation can apply for the ICAR IVRI Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process,...
